feed.title: Beyond the Box Labs
feed.subtitle: Open source scripts and tools from the Professional Services team at Beyond the Box.

entry.title: Introducing JSS Resource Tools
entry.content:
JSS Resource Tools is a command line utility written in Python that utilises the JSS API in order to import, export and update JSS resources en-masse.

As our first release for Beyond the Box Labs, we are proud to open source this fantastic tool that has enabled us to develop and implement some awesome custom workflows using Casper & Jamf Pro.
entry.summary: JSS Resource Tools is a command line utility written in Python that utilises the JSS API in order to import, export and update JSS resources en-masse.

entry.title: Beyond the Box Labs
entry.content:
Beyond the Box are a technology solutions provider based in Melbourne, Australia.

We work with clients of all shapes and sizes to deploy, manage and support quality IT infrastructure and varied client bases in schools, businesses and government.

Through our work, our engineers have developed many scripts and tools to automate workflows and craft bespoke deployment strategies for our clients. In other cases, we are lucky to have been able to lean on the amazing contributions of the wider community - scripts, tools and software that make our collective lives easier.

Beyond the Box Labs is our contribution back to the community that we love. Where possible, we will be open sourcing internal tools that have helped us deliver best in class deployments and support to our customers.
entry.summary: Beyond the Box are a technology solutions provider based in Melbourne, Australia.
